00018 PulseCandidateFinder::PulseCandidateFinder(std::string detname, modules::options* opts): fChannel(detname) {
00019 
00020   if (fDefaultParameterValues.empty()) {
00021     SetDefaultParameterValues();
00022   }
00023   
00024   if (fOneSigmaValues.empty()) {
00025     SetOneSigmaValues();
00026   }
00027 
00028   if (fPedestalValues.empty()) {
00029     SetPedestalValues();
00030   }
00031 
00032   fNSigma = opts->GetInt("n_sigma", 0);
00033   if (fNSigma == 0) {
00034     fParameterValue = opts->GetInt(detname, fDefaultParameterValues[fChannel]); // set the parameter value for this channel
00035   }
00036   else {
00037     fParameterValue = fNSigma * fOneSigmaValues[IDs::channel(detname)];
00038   }
00039 
00040   fNoise = fOneSigmaValues[IDs::channel(fChannel)];
00041   fPedestal = fPedestalValues[IDs::channel(fChannel)];
00042 
00043   if (opts->HasOption("debug") && (opts->GetOption("debug").empty() || opts->GetBool("debug"))) {
00044     std::cout << "Parameter Value for " << fChannel << " PulseCandidateFinder is " << fParameterValue << std::endl; // would be nice to know which module this is for
00045   }
00046 }
00047 
00050 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindPulseCandidates(TPulseIsland* pulse) {
00051 
00052   // Clear the vector of pulse candidate locations first since it will still contain them from previous pulses
00053   fPulseCandidateLocations.clear();
00054 
00055   fPulseIsland = pulse;
00056 
00057   // We have a different algorithm for fast and slow pulses
00058   if (fChannel.isFast()) {
00059     FindCandidatePulses_Fast(fParameterValue);
00060   }
00061   else if (fChannel.isSlow()) {
00062     FindCandidatePulses_Slow(fParameterValue);
00063   }
00064   else {
00065     // this is a scintillator so do the fast pulse analysis
00066     FindCandidatePulses_Fast(fParameterValue);
00067   }
00068 }

00070 PulseCandidateFinder::~PulseCandidateFinder() {
00071 }
00072 
00075 void PulseCandidateFinder::GetPulseCandidates(std::vector<TPulseIsland*>& pulse_candidates)const {
00076 
00077   // Loop through the pulse candidate locations
00078   std::vector<int>::const_iterator start_new, stop_new;
00079   for (std::vector<Location>::const_iterator locationIter = fPulseCandidateLocations.begin();
00080           locationIter != fPulseCandidateLocations.end(); ++locationIter) {
00081     
00082     // Get iterator to the start locations
00083     start_new=fPulseIsland->GetSamples().begin();
00084     std::advance(start_new,locationIter->start);
00085 
00086     // Get iterator to the stop locations
00087     stop_new=fPulseIsland->GetSamples().begin();
00088     std::advance(stop_new,locationIter->stop);
00089 
00090     // Get the bank name and work out what the new timestamp will be
00091     std::string bankname = fPulseIsland->GetBankName();
00092     int new_timestamp = fPulseIsland->GetTimeStamp() + locationIter->start;
00093 
00094     // Make the new TPI
00095     int index=locationIter-fPulseCandidateLocations.begin();
00096     if((int)pulse_candidates.size() <= index || !pulse_candidates.at(index)){
00097         TPulseIsland* pulse_island = new TPulseIsland(new_timestamp, start_new, stop_new, bankname);
00098         pulse_candidates.push_back(pulse_island);
00099     }else{
00100         TPulseIsland* pulse_island=pulse_candidates.at(index);
00101         pulse_island->SetSamples(start_new,stop_new);
00102         pulse_island->SetTimeStamp(new_timestamp);
00103         pulse_island->SetBankName(bankname);
00104     }
00105   }
00106   for(unsigned int i=fPulseCandidateLocations.size();i< pulse_candidates.size();++i){
00107       pulse_candidates.at(i)->Reset();
00108   }
00109 }
00110 
00113 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindCandidatePulses_Fast(int rise) {
00114 
00115   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00116   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00117 
00118   std::string bankname = fPulseIsland->GetBankName();
00119   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00120 
00121   int s1, s2, ds; // this sample value, the previous sample value and the change in the sample value
00122   bool found = false;
00123   Location location;
00124 
00125   // Loop through the samples
00126   int n_before_start_samples = 2; // take a few samples from before the official start
00127   for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00128     s1 = polarity * (samples[i-1] - fPedestal);
00129     s2 = polarity * (samples[i] - fPedestal);
00130     ds = s2 - s1;
00131 
00132     if (found) {
00133 
00134       if (s2 < fNoise) { // stop if the sample goes below pedestal
00135         location.stop = (int)i;
00136         if (location.stop >= (int)samples.size()) {
00137           location.stop = samples.size() - 1;
00138         }
00139 
00140         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00141         found = false;
00142       }
00143       else if (i == n_samples-1) { // Also stop if we are at the last sample (only do this check if we failed the above one)
00144         location.stop = (int) i;
00145 
00146         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00147         found = false;
00148       }
00149     } else {
00150       if (ds > rise) {
00151         found = true;
00152         location.start = (int)(i - 1) - n_before_start_samples;
00153 
00154         if (location.start < 0) {
00155           location.start = 0;
00156         }
00157       }
00158     }
00159   }
00160 }
00161 
00164 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindCandidatePulses_Slow(int threshold) {
00165 
00166   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00167   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00168 
00169   std::string bankname = fPulseIsland->GetBankName();
00170   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00171 
00172   int sample_height; // the sample's height above pedestal
00173   int start, stop; // the start and stop location
00174   bool found = false;
00175   Location location;
00176 
00177   // Loop through the samples
00178   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00179     sample_height = polarity * (samples[i] - fPedestal);
00180 
00181     if (found) {
00182       if (sample_height < fNoise) { // stop if the sample goes below pedestal
00183         location.stop = (int)i;
00184         if (location.stop >=(int) samples.size()) {
00185           location.stop = samples.size() - 1;
00186         }
00187 
00188         start = stop = 0;
00189         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00190         found = false;
00191       }
00192       else if (i == n_samples-1) { // Also stop if we are at the last sample (only do this check if we failed the above one)
00193         location.stop = (int) i;
00194 
00195         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00196         found = false;
00197       }
00198     } else {
00199       if (sample_height > threshold) {
00200         found = true;
00201 
00202         // Track back until we get to the pedestal again so that we get the whole pulse (Ge-S pulses were being cut-off at the start)
00203         location.start = (int)(i);
00204         for (int j = i; j > 0; --j) {
00205 
00206           sample_height = polarity * (samples[j] - fPedestal);
00207           if (sample_height <= 0) {
00208             location.start = (int)(j);
00209             break;
00210           }
00211         }
00212         if (location.start < 0) {
00213           location.start = 0;
00214         }
00215       }
00216     }
00217   }
00218 }

00223 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillParameterHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {
00224 
00225   std::string detname = TSetupData::Instance()->GetDetectorName(fPulseIsland->GetBankName());
00226   IDs::channel theChannel = detname;
00227 
00228   std::string parameter_name = "Unknown";
00229 
00230   // We have a different algorithm for fast and slow pulses
00231   if (theChannel.isFast()) {
00232     parameter_name = "SampleDifference";
00233     FillSampleDifferencesHistogram(histogram);
00234   }
00235   else if (theChannel.isSlow()) {
00236     parameter_name = "SampleHeight";
00237     FillSampleHeightsHistogram(histogram);
00238   }
00239   else {
00240     // it's a scintillator so plot the fast parameters
00241     parameter_name = "SampleDifference";
00242     FillSampleDifferencesHistogram(histogram);
00243   }
00244 
00245   std::stringstream histtitle;
00246   histtitle << "Plot of " << parameter_name << " for " << detname << " for Run " << SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetRunNumber();
00247   histogram->SetTitle(histtitle.str().c_str());
00248   histogram->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("");
00249   histogram->GetXaxis()->SetTitle(parameter_name.c_str());
00250 }

00254 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillSampleDifferencesHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {
00255 
00256   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00257   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00258   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00259 
00260   int s1, s2, ds; // this sample value, the previous sample value and the change in the sample value
00261 
00262   // Loop through the samples
00263   for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00264     s1 = polarity * (samples[i-1] - fPedestal);
00265     s2 = polarity * (samples[i] - fPedestal);
00266     ds = s2 - s1;
00267 
00268     histogram->Fill(ds);
00269   }
00270 }

00274 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillSampleHeightsHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {
00275 
00276   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00277   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00278   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00279 
00280   int sample_height; // the height of this sample above pedestal
00281 
00282   // Loop through the samples
00283   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00284     sample_height = polarity * (samples[i] - fPedestal);
00285 
00286     histogram->Fill(sample_height);
00287   }
00288 }

00295 void PulseCandidateFinder::SetDefaultParameterValues() {
00296 
00297   // Set all the default values for the fast channels
00298   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("muSc")] = 300;
00299   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("muScA")] = 100;
00300   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("NDet")] = 100;
00301   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("NDet2")] = 100;
00302 
00303   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("Ge-F")] = 40;
00304 
00305   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("ScL")] = 15;
00306   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("ScR")] = 20;
00307   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("ScGe")] = 20;
00308   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("ScVe")] = 30;
00309 
00310   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiL2-F")] = 80;
00311   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiL1-1-F")] = 40;
00312   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiL1-2-F")] = 20;
00313   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiL1-3-F")] = 20;
00314   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiL1-4-F")] = 80;
00315 
00316   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiR2-F")] = 20;
00317   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiR1-1-F")] = 40;
00318   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiR1-2-F")] = 60;
00319   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiR1-3-F")] = 80;
00320   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiR1-4-F")] = 40;
00321 
00322   // Set all the default values for the slow parameters
00323   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("Ge-S")] = 500;
00324 
00325   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiL2-S")] = 20;
00326   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiL1-1-S")] = 20;
00327   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiL1-2-S")] = 150;
00328   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiL1-3-S")] = 20;
00329   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiL1-4-S")] = 40;
00330 
00331   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiR2-S")] = 50;
00332   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiR1-1-S")] = 50;
00333   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiR1-2-S")] = 30;
00334   fDefaultParameterValues[IDs::channel("SiR1-3-S")] = 40;

00339 std::map<IDs::channel, double> PulseCandidateFinder::fOneSigmaValues;
00340 
00344 void PulseCandidateFinder::SetOneSigmaValues() {
00345 
00346   // The values that we will read in
00347   std::string run_number;
00348   std::string detname, bankname;
00349   std::string pedestal, noise;
00350 
00351   // Get the SQLite database file
00352   TSQLiteServer* server = new TSQLiteServer("sqlite://pedestals-and-noises.sqlite");
00353 
00354   std::stringstream query; 
00355   std::string tablename = "pedestals_and_noises";
00356   if (server) {
00357 
00358     query << "SELECT * FROM " << tablename << ";"; // get all the pedestals and noises
00359     TSQLiteResult* result = (TSQLiteResult*) server->Query(query.str().c_str());  // get the result of this query
00360     query.str(""); // clear the stringstream after use
00361 
00362     TSQLiteRow* row = (TSQLiteRow*) result->Next(); // get the first row
00363     while (row != NULL) {
00364       //      std::cout << row->GetField(0) << " " << row->GetField(1) << " " << row->GetField(2) << " " << row->GetField(3) << " " << row->GetField(4) << std::endl;
00365       run_number = row->GetField(0);
00366       detname = row->GetField(1);
00367       bankname = row->GetField(2);
00368       pedestal = row->GetField(3);
00369       noise = row->GetField(4);
00370 
00371       fOneSigmaValues[IDs::channel(detname)] = atof(noise.c_str());
00372       
00373       delete row;
00374       row = (TSQLiteRow*) result->Next(); // get the next row
00375     }
00376     delete result; // user has to delete the result
00377   }
00378   else {
00379     std::cout << "Error: Couldn't connect to SQLite database" << std::endl;
00380   }
00381 }
